website_summaries.verdict: Customers seeking ultra-compact refrigerator will admire the clever convertible design.
pros: Customers appreciate how easily the 1.1-cubic-foot freezer converts to a refrigerator
Included lock and keys helpful for shared-living situations
cons: A few complaints of fridge dripping

customer_reviews.title: DEFECTIVE PRODUCT. POORLY ENGINEERED!!!! READ  BELOW!
customer_reviews.text: I am a techy so I put a continuous temperature monitor inside this refrigerator. The temperature swing is 10 degree farenheit. REFRIGERATORS according to FDA should be kept at 40F or less. So with a 10 degree range, that is impossible, because if the range is 30-40F, then your food will freeze. I called EDGESTAR and they said the PRODUCT IS MANUFACTURED to have a 5-10F range. So if this is just a beer or soda fridge it is okay, but it is not okay for perishable food!! I WAS ABLE TO GET A REFUND without issue.
customer_reviews.author: Donald S. Levy

customer_reviews.title: It’s okay
customer_reviews.text: It’s okay. It keeps things cold but it’s way too small inside. You lose half of the entire bottom shelf due to the compressor. Mine also has ice forming around the area where the seal is so I have to constantly make sure things are still frozen. Wouldn’t really recommend to anyone for the cost. Also the customer service isn’t great. Tried to cancel within an hour of ordering and was told they have no control over whether or not it ships once ordered.
customer_reviews.author: KC

customer_reviews.title: Refrigerator Condensates Constantly
customer_reviews.text: There is constant condensation with the refrigerator being opened only twice a day. Customer service insists this is normal operation for this refrigerator and that there is nothing they can do. I would not purchase this refrigerator unless you want everything inside soaking wet.
customer_reviews.author: Tracy & Amy

customer_reviews.title: What a great idea.  Turn a dial to go from freezer to fridge.
customer_reviews.text: It's exactly as promised. A mini-fridge that you can turn into a freezer by turning the dial. The dial is inside so none of that stupid controls at the back like some of the other units on the market. Has a reversible door and it's lockable. Worked great when I needed to ice an injury and I could freeze the cold packs during the 48 hours needed. Afterwords, I just turned it back to a fridge for normal use. If you are going to have a mini-fridge, why not get the option of using it as a freezer when needed?
customer_reviews.author: B. Kerr

customer_reviews.title: 24/7 Clean Ice for a Good Elixir!!
customer_reviews.text: I am using this great appliance in my bed room and it resolved good quality Ice and cold glass issues for my drinks. It is very quiet and you don't need to make it work in maximum capacity to freeze the items. Very practical and easy to use!
customer_reviews.author: Gunnie

customer_reviews.title: Quiet and Efficient
customer_reviews.text: *Nice surprise - arrived one day AHEAD of schedule - fast delivery - compliments to seller *As another said in a review this unit runs so quiet I was wondering if it was even working! I am glad I bought a digital thermometer to monitor temperature in the unit. It cooled down fast. I had to back off on the setting control to get to my desired temperature (35 degrees) *Warning: the dimensions are larger than the listed size. I was concerned at first that it would not fit in the area I had available - however it turned out to fit fine. *Solid construction. Nice stainless steel door front. I recommend this.
customer_reviews.author: Rod Mael

customer_reviews.title: This freezer is wonderful and gets down to ~0 degrees
customer_reviews.text: This freezer is wonderful and gets down to ~0 degrees. You can use it as either a freezer or a fridge without any worry. If anyone is curious there are coolant lines through the entire top of the unit so if you plan on drilling into it be extremely cautious and use a very small bit. There are instructions on the web to find where the cooling lines are, just make sure to measure twice and cut once!
customer_reviews.author: Time

customer_reviews.title: Keeping thing cool
customer_reviews.text: This little fridge does a great job maintaining the set temperature. Using it strictly as a refrigerator (not a freezer) it maintains a temperature of +/- 2 degrees F. I have only had the unit for a couple of weeks, so I can't attest to the long term durability, but it appears to be an excellent product.
customer_reviews.author: R. Reardon

customer_reviews.title: This is a great little freezer
customer_reviews.text: My previous negative review was regarding delivery only. This is a great little freezer. After I set it up it reached -20° within the hour. I then adjusted the temperature using the thermometer. It holds more than I realized. As a senior citizen, living alone, I buy a lot of frozen items. This freezer helps tremendously with the overload in my regular refrig/freezer. I definitely recommend this product!
customer_reviews.author: DeDe

customer_reviews.title: Durability
customer_reviews.text: I purchased my unit 4 years ago and it has kept up very nicely. I use it for ice packs for my work. The only reason I gave it a 4 star rating is because it develope ice around the door seal and I have to defrost or scrape ice at least monthly which is inconvenient. If you don’t do it the door will pop open. Otherwise this unit is really great for small spaces and obviously it has lasted a long time. Great price too.
customer_reviews.author: Esthetician

customer_reviews.title: Very quality frig/freezer - worked quickly out of the box.
customer_reviews.text: This "like-new" product looks and works as if brand new! I am using this strictly for storing extra frozen food. It looks fine on my counter next to the refrigerator, a bonus when it fit under the cabinets. It was freezing the water in my test large ice cube tray in less than 2 hours. When I first plugged it in I wasn't sure it was working - it is that quiet. So far so good, if any issues emerge I will update later. At this point I am very happy with this purchase! :D
customer_reviews.author: Nurilee

customer_reviews.title: Quiet and efficient!
customer_reviews.text: We bought this little freezer for a parent who had knee replacement surgery. It sits in an upstairs bedroom so that ice packs are always on hand without our parent having to navigate stairs in the dark. We were pleasantly surprised at both how powerful it can freeze and how quiet it is when it runs. It is also not super noisy when it switches on and off either. This was important for something that sits in a bedroom. It has been running for about a month on the minimum freeze setting, and there is not a lot of frost. It did come with the most ridiculously cute small ice tray ever!
customer_reviews.author: Educ8r13

customer_reviews.title: Ice Cold Freezer
customer_reviews.text: We just got our minifreezer set up last night. The freezer is amazing! It’s a little bigger than I expected it would be, so it doesnt quite fit under the cabinets, but we had another place for it. It does lock. It is a very cold freezer. No need to put it on max (your icecream will be rock hard lol) unless you want things really frozen. We have it on halfway between max and min for the freezer right now
customer_reviews.author: Laura Applegate

customer_reviews.title: Item has a big dent (thanks UPS) and the lock is useless.
customer_reviews.text: The item came damaged, that's not the manufacturers fault, that's UPS. The fridge works really well, it keeps my food cold, so I really can't complain. The lock is garbage, it's like a deadbolt, but you can lift the door to bypass the lock, so there's no point in putting a lock on this fridge in the first place if it doesn't work. Other than that it's a good product and it does exactly what it should do.
customer_reviews.author: Alan

customer_reviews.title: Runs Very Quiet
customer_reviews.text: So far this item has lived up to its hype. It does indeed run whisper quiet. I am a light sleeper and have this in my bedroom but it has never woken me up. When I’m awake I can hear when it periodically kicks on but even that is so quiet that the room has to be dead silent in order to hear it. It keeps my bottled waters and sodas perfectly cold. I have not yet tried it in freezer mode.
customer_reviews.author: InDaKnow

customer_reviews.title: Mostly good
customer_reviews.text: Good: Really nice & gets really cold if you want it to. Bad: hard to tell where the temp switch is between fridge/freezer. Sweats on the inside walls & you need to take a towel to get all that water off the walls. Also, the lock is just silly. Any small screwdriver could open it, or a Phillips will unscrew the part the lock goes into.
customer_reviews.author: Joshua W.

customer_reviews.title: Wow
customer_reviews.text: I didn't think I'd like this so much. Not a lot of space inside, but it gets extremely cold. Double boxed with Styrofoam between. No scratches. No dents. Not too heavy. Perfect. Thanks :) edit: It's a decent freezer. However, this thing has no way to deal with condensation as a refrigerator. Your stuff will be wet af. GJ engineer @ edgestar.
customer_reviews.author: Tomek

customer_reviews.title: Do not purchase if you are solely buying because it “locks”
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this freezer solely for the locking capability. Only to find that the “lock” it provides is literally only a small piece of metal underneath that is screwed on with two Phillips head screws... If you are purchasing this for security purposes, might as well save $100 on buy the less expensive brand because this lock does absolutely nothing to keep the contents secure.
customer_reviews.author: James

customer_reviews.title: Not very pleased
customer_reviews.text: It constantly drips condensation. It doesn't matter if it is opened frequently or not. It just continues to drip off the top. Anything put in it really needs to be wrapped and rewrapped.
customer_reviews.author: Barbara Schuler

customer_reviews.title: ... and it keeps things very cold and is a great little unit
customer_reviews.text: Got this little freezer for my mom - and it keeps things very cold and is a great little unit. Holds more than I expected, too.
customer_reviews.author: Stace23

customer_reviews.title: Working well
customer_reviews.text: This product arrived on time. It was packaged well, so there were no dents or scratches. It is quiet and has been holding at -20 degrees since I plugged it in 3 weeks ago. I do not need the lock feature, but if someone needed it to prevent theft or unauthorized access, a unit with a more industrial grade lock would be more appropriate.
customer_reviews.author: Deb L

customer_reviews.title: Super little freezer.
customer_reviews.text: Works great holding frozen Jolly Pops for my costumers. The door has been opened at least a thousand times and it operates beautifully still. Keeping cold even with the constant door opening is no problem. We have only used it as a freezer.
customer_reviews.author: Paul Garwood

customer_reviews.title: Great service and product.
customer_reviews.text: This is the perfect size for our outdoor kitchen on our RV. This works great. Would recommend for anyone who needs a little extra freezer or refrigerator space. Super fast delivery.
customer_reviews.author: Lisa

customer_reviews.title: Reliable performance and longevity
customer_reviews.text: Just bought a second unit for different location use. First unit still going strong after 5 years. The only issue is the hard plastic liner on the interior surface of the door cracked. Resealed it using fiber tape and epoxy. Wish that it is a frost free unit.
customer_reviews.author: H Vu

customer_reviews.title: GREAT PRODUCT
customer_reviews.text: I am using this a a freezer to store my breast milk. I have to older kids, and needed something that they couldn't open and get into. This product has allowed me to have a place to store my milk and keep my kids out of it. And it's heavy enough that they can't pull it off.
customer_reviews.author: Pequoria

customer_reviews.title: so I very much like how quickly it cools down
customer_reviews.text: I have had this item for several months. I do not use it all the time, so I very much like how quickly it cools down. I am a small senior woman but had no trouble carrying this up my split foyer steps. It is perfect for extra space when I am entertaining. It is quiet and I like the stainless appearance. It does ice up fairly quickly in the freezer mode, but it defrosts in a flash. Be aware that it won't hold tons of stuff, but I'd say it frees up at least a full width shelf in my regular 'fridge.
customer_reviews.author: Marilyn Will

customer_reviews.title: Love it
customer_reviews.text: Have this under desk at work to keep ice packs to do ice therapy. Quiet and can use as freezer or as frig. Love it.
customer_reviews.author: Customer

customer_reviews.title: Perfect fridge for work. Adjustment knob is fine - don't believe other reviews.
customer_reviews.text: This product is excellent. It is super quiet, and holds temperature very well (I left a thermometer in mine since it's under my desk at work). There are a lot of reviews stating that the temperature knob doesn't work right - I think you need to pay attention to markings and make sure you are smarter than the knob. 1) The box has a fridge mode and a freezer mode 2) "Min" means minimum cooling (warmest) and "Max" means maximum cooling (coldest) 3) There's a double line || in between the two modes. And all that information is clearly labeled on the knob.
customer_reviews.author: Michael Miller

customer_reviews.title: Perfect Freezer
customer_reviews.text: Installed on my boat to enable a better solution for freezer other than the small unit in the fridge. The unit freezes perfectly and is very quiet. Love it.
customer_reviews.author: Dave

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: Great product- exactly what I was looking for- it is quiet, it was delivered quickly, works as promised, and the price was right! Very happy with my purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer - Michelle

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for Camping!
customer_reviews.text: This versatile little thing is priceless on a campout. A little pricey but worth it. From Fridge to Freezer... you can't beat it.
customer_reviews.author: Grannie G

customer_reviews.title: This works great! it small and fits on the counter and ...
customer_reviews.text: purchased this for my office because we needed a separate freezer unit for vaccines. This works great! it small and fits on the counter and keeps the vaccines neze and cold ( The coldest recorded is -20F). but it also has a refrigerator setting if you nee to keep it for an in-room or garage fridge for drinks and whatnot
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great little freezer!
customer_reviews.text: Freezer in my apartment is tiny so I had to get this one. It works wonderfully! This freezer is dedicated to my fresh fruit that I froze. I love it!
customer_reviews.author: Kathryn I Bond

customer_reviews.title: Arrived damaged and essentially broken
customer_reviews.text: The lower metal hinge on the door was bent inwards when the unit arrived, and the door would not come close to closing all the way. Overextending the door open appeared to partially fix the problem, but the unit still does not make a complete seal. The unit as a whole is worthless if it cannot make a good seal, so I consider it broken.
customer_reviews.author: Vanessa Mather

customer_reviews.title: Updated 10-2016.  The unit has worked great with freeze temps around -20F
customer_reviews.text: I understand some of the reviews regarding temp. settings. It is the difference between Refig mode and Freeze mode. I had no problem. I use only the Freeze setting. The unit has worked great with freeze temps around -20F. Yes, -20 Fahrenheit. Oct 2016. I have been using this unit solely as a freezer and it is great. Never a problem. I would definitely purchase again. Hopefully the price will be about the same.
customer_reviews.author: Mad Beach

customer_reviews.title: SO GOOD
customer_reviews.text: I look for this product for months, it is the best, i use it on my boat works so good.
customer_reviews.author: Tye Stevens

customer_reviews.title: Versatile
customer_reviews.text: I have used this in a van on a long cross country tour, which it probably wasn't designed to do, and it held up well to the abuse. The temperature adjustment does take some fiddling with -- easy to get the freezer going but getting the refrigerator temperatures just right is more tricky. You will want to get a fridge/freezer thermometer (they aren't expensive). I generally left it in freezer mode and froze blue ice packs for the ice chest that functioned as the refrigerator.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Two - Three Year Freezer
customer_reviews.text: I bought this Freezer May 2014 and it worked good until about January 2017 and stopped working. I have tried to do without one but I really need another one for my office at work. I like the Lock feature and there are very few on the market that Lock. I hate to buy another Freezer and only get 2.5 - 3 years service out of it. I will keep looking.
customer_reviews.author: Terry W.

customer_reviews.title: Great
customer_reviews.text: So far very happy with our purchase. Looks and operates as claimed. This solved our problem.
customer_reviews.author: Steve Boyet

customer_reviews.title: It was delivered with wonderful packaging and was just the right size we needed ...
customer_reviews.text: We have had this refrigerator for about a month now and it is working fabulous. It was delivered with wonderful packaging and was just the right size we needed for our office.
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer Reza

customer_reviews.title: Exactly what we needed!
customer_reviews.text: We needed a locking mini frig. and this one was perfect. It was needed to keep our meds cold and secure. The stainless front looks great in the nurses office. It was delivered on time and in perfect condition, I really liked the fact that it was doubled boxed (no damage). I will but from this company again.
customer_reviews.author: Robert Hageman

customer_reviews.title: We will see
customer_reviews.text: Has been getting extremely warm to the touch on the outside of the fridge. Keeps things cold inside.
customer_reviews.author: Holly

customer_reviews.title: Awesome Product!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this to be used as a freezer, even though it can also be used as a refrigerator. I have had a GREAT experience with the quality of this freezer as it does the job incredibly well. I had compared to many other products offered and this was the best for me by far. Please know as I state it once again, it works great as a freezer. Thank You!
customer_reviews.author: Russ LeMaster

customer_reviews.title: Great Freezer, Fair Frig.
customer_reviews.text: The EdgeStar works great as a freezer. The refrigerator works OK when you get the temp set correctly. The temperature setting for the refrigerator is very sensitive, and hard to get adjusted correctly for the refrigerator to keep from freezing the items. We use it as a freezer while we are camping. Plug the unit in and is to 0 degree in less than two hours. I would recommend this item to anyone looking for a good compact freezer/frig. It is easily loaded and unloaded when moving the camper.
customer_reviews.author: Linda M. Jenkins

customer_reviews.title: Trk drvr
customer_reviews.text: Great so far ot will freeZe everything solid even when packed to the. Gills and in lower than max.
customer_reviews.author: Danny

customer_reviews.title: Best thing since...
customer_reviews.text: It’s my understanding it’s the best thing since Rice Krispies!
customer_reviews.author: path66002

customer_reviews.title: Quiet and Cold
customer_reviews.text: Seem to be working great! Bought for work to keep beverages cold, and if you're very careful you can get the unit to drop just below freezing and not freeze the contents.
customer_reviews.author: J. Snyder

customer_reviews.title: Works very well
customer_reviews.text: It is ice cold on the fridge setting. Quiet operation. Nice look that blends nicely with room décor. Fits well in the space needed it for. Holds a good amount of food and drinks, was surprised at how much it holds.. a very good purchase. Worth every penny. I recommend this product to anyone thinking about buying it.
customer_reviews.author: KT

customer_reviews.title: The best I've seen.
customer_reviews.text: Best unit I have ever bought. Way better than expected.
customer_reviews.author: Lee   St Clair

customer_reviews.title: perfect for the office
customer_reviews.text: I now have two of these refrigerator/freezers in my office....I just love them
customer_reviews.author: kitty

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for an office, fits nicely under my desk.
customer_reviews.text: Works very well in my new office. It's quiet; I can barely hear when it turns on. It can hold a decent amount of drinks and basic food for lunches. I haven't found a major problem with it. If it was a bit bigger, or had something on the door to hold smaller stuff, it would be amazing.
customer_reviews.author: Chris

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for the RV!
customer_reviews.text: Works as described. The unit is very handy and can be used either as a refer or freezer. Perfect for RV trips or camping where power is available.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for our office
customer_reviews.text: Great product so far. We got this for our office conference room to keep client drinks cold.
customer_reviews.author: Cassie Williams (TheLashBomb dot com)

customer_reviews.title: Great fridge for the office
customer_reviews.text: I've had it for 1 month now and am using it as a refrigerator, and it holds perfect temp for vaccine storage (+-5 degrees F°). I have an electronic min/max temperature bottle to keep track of temp readings. Very quite and looks great with the stainless steel finish.
customer_reviews.author: John

customer_reviews.title: Good quality, nice looking
customer_reviews.text: Good quality, nice looking, roomy. Defrosts quickly. Purchased it for my mother in the nursing home. She kept a supply of blueberries and her favourite bread & ice cream in it. One of the 2 keys finally broke, probably from overuse. Doesn't need to locked though. Great freezer or fridge, whichever way you choose to use it. Advise purchasing a temperature gauge and leaving it inside, so you know it's at the right temp.
customer_reviews.author: Sandra

customer_reviews.title: Quiet & Perfect
customer_reviews.text: I was timid to plug in this fridge at work, but was instantly surprised at how QUIET it runs! I have to strain to hear it running, and worried that it wasn't running when I came back into work the next day. The temperature controls were a little confusing at first, but operates beautifully! I have not tried the freezer setting yet, but my drinks, lunches and fruit are kept perfectly chilled! The lock is a little funky at first, but works great for securing my items from potential work thieves. Great item - worth every dollar!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Lock up the goodies so I can sleep!
customer_reviews.text: Perfect. Perfect. Perfect. As someone who has loved ones with nighttime eating disorders, this works great.
customer_reviews.author: The Queen of Healthy Latin Cooking

customer_reviews.title: Glad I got this
customer_reviews.text: Love it. Just right for small amount of food or beverages.
customer_reviews.author: cshopz

customer_reviews.title: Fridge
customer_reviews.text: Works good. The only thing I would change is the make it BOTH a separate fridge and freezer in one Rather than ONE OR THE OTHER choice for the same price of course
customer_reviews.author: Marie

customer_reviews.title: This little freezer solved the problem of the BF turning ...
customer_reviews.text: This little freezer solved the problem of the BF turning up the fridge causing my eggs to freeze. He likes drinks ice cold and now this little freezer sits next to his chair. First day we put it on high freeze and it froze drinks solid. Few extra turns down and drinks are perfectly cold!
customer_reviews.author: Nikki

customer_reviews.title: Great Price, Holding temperature.
customer_reviews.text: Great Price, quick ship. Temperature seems to be holding well. Currently using it as a freezer.
customer_reviews.author: Electrogirl

customer_reviews.title: not loud, moisture as a fridge
customer_reviews.text: was concerned about noise with reviews. It is way quieter than a full size. It does however, produce condensation inside at the top (40degrees), which means moisture inside if that is a concern.
customer_reviews.author: AZ-K

customer_reviews.title: An ideal purchase
customer_reviews.text: This compact refrig/freezer is ideal for my room. Thank you
customer_reviews.author: B Mccoy

customer_reviews.title: Don't delay
customer_reviews.text: Great size & very fast delivery. I like the feature of using it as a freezer or fridge.
customer_reviews.author: ccromdome

customer_reviews.title: Needed more room
customer_reviews.text: The shelves are not quite wide enough for what I wanted but it'll do for smaller things like personal pizzas or lean cuisine sized meals. It frosts up too quickly for me though.
customer_reviews.author: wayne joseph spiker

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Awesome delivery time, product was described perfectly, will shop again!!!!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Works as advertised. Keep my ice cream frozen just fine.
customer_reviews.text: Works as advertised. Keep my ice cream frozen just fine. Fully adjustable temp to a normal refrigerator temp, or break your tooth on rock hard ice cream temp, IF you chose that. Locks up OK too. I'd recommend this to repel ice cream chain devouring kids. Works just fine.
customer_reviews.author: John Morley

customer_reviews.title: Freezer fridge
customer_reviews.text: This little freezer fridge is light weight and does every thing you expect it to do for you. Nice n cold
customer_reviews.author: Victoria

customer_reviews.title: it works great and super quiet
customer_reviews.text: I had this freezer for several month now, it works great and super quiet. love it.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Perfect fit!
customer_reviews.text: Granddaughter loves it in her dorm room! Using it as a freezer!
customer_reviews.author: Joan Griffin

customer_reviews.title: COOOOLD!!!
customer_reviews.text: This revigerator is as advertized. When it first arrived i plugged it in on its coldest setting and it dropped to -15DefF in no time. Maintains 38degF with a small cycle time.
customer_reviews.author: Special K

customer_reviews.title: If you don't need this you should still get it
customer_reviews.text: What a great product, I've never heard of edgestar before I bought this and they have not let me down.
customer_reviews.author: Raza

customer_reviews.title: Very happy with purchase
customer_reviews.text: We purchased the unit for extra freezer space on our live aboard cabin cruiser. It works perfectly in the small space the cost is much less than units designed specifically for marine use.
customer_reviews.author: aquatherapy

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Extremely quiet and works well in a bedroom or man cave for more private areas.
customer_reviews.author: KyGuy

customer_reviews.title: Does not have a secure lock
customer_reviews.text: The lock is a joke! It’s does not have a real key, basically it can be open with allan’s Wrench.
customer_reviews.author: Dzenan Lulic

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: It was great. I gave it away as a gift.
customer_reviews.author: Deborah Carter-Williams

customer_reviews.title: Compact Refrigerator
customer_reviews.text: This is a GREAT purchase, it keeps my beverages cool and I also purchased a digital thermostat with it so I know exactly what the temp is. Great Product.
customer_reviews.author: Bryan

customer_reviews.title: No freezer which is a feature we wanted
customer_reviews.text: We fit this inside a cabinet to hide it. Works perfectly. Deceptive how much room is inside
customer_reviews.author: Barbara J.

customer_reviews.title: ... this to store breastmilk in my nursery and it's great..
customer_reviews.text: I got this to store breastmilk in my nursery and it's great...it's super quiet even though I have it right next to the bed. The only annoying thing is that there is no light in the fridge so trying to find a bottle in the fridge in the middle of the night was frustrating so we installed a battery powered motion sensor light in it and now it's perfect.
customer_reviews.author: J. Gonzalez

customer_reviews.title: awesome
customer_reviews.text: Wow what a product at a great great price. Freezes food solid. I have it in my daughter's dorm works anazing
customer_reviews.author: P. Latella

customer_reviews.title: Good little freezer
customer_reviews.text: Had an issue with the keys.... weren't included in the box, then found out they were locked inside the freezer and the door needs to be removed to get at them.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: This freezer does the job
customer_reviews.text: This freezer is perfect for my needs. It is compact and extremely quiet. I barely hear it run. I was also concerned that a refrigerator could also act as a freezer. However, I was very pleasently surprised, in that I had to turn it down a few notches. On max, cool I couldn't scoop my ice cream! I've added items to the freezer and it has taken it from room temp. to frozen in just a few hours. I would definitely recommend this freezer for someone that doesn't have a lot of room and/or needs a little extra freezer space.
customer_reviews.author: Rey S

customer_reviews.title: Two Stars
customer_reviews.text: Works ok, but the contents in the fridge are alway wet went I take them out.
customer_reviews.author: JFern

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: this is a great mini freezer that we use in our RV
customer_reviews.author: mother

customer_reviews.title: You like really COLD beer?  This is a must!
customer_reviews.text: Purchased this to supplement my bar storage for the Bud Light 16oz Aluminum bottles. I like to keep them at 23 degrees and this unit works perfect for the task. I hung a digital thermometer and after just a few hours was able to get it dialed right in. It is quiet, holds temp, and looks great for a little unit. For the price it is the only choice I found after searching what is out there.
customer_reviews.author: Jeff R.

customer_reviews.title: ... extra freezer room for pumped breastmilk and this was perfect. It sits in the corner of my sons ...
customer_reviews.text: Bought to have extra freezer room for pumped breastmilk and this was perfect. It sits in the corner of my sons room and stays cold enough to freeze everything quickly.
customer_reviews.author: Chively

customer_reviews.title: Works well
customer_reviews.text: We use it in the "basement" of our fitfh wheel trailer so any noise it might make we would never hear and it certainly keeps everything cold enough.
customer_reviews.author: Don E Chandler

customer_reviews.title: Great for big households!
customer_reviews.text: Great size and keeps my drinks locked up from my roommates!
customer_reviews.author: Natasha

customer_reviews.title: Works great! Needed a freezer for our 2 week boat ...
customer_reviews.text: Works great ! Needed a freezer for our 2 week boat trip and this worked perfect! Glad we purchased !
customer_reviews.author: LINDA BERTIE

customer_reviews.title: Its ok
customer_reviews.text: My feezer came with a punch in the corner but I coud not return it because I needed it urgently and I am in Costa Rica. Also, the temperature is 15C not 18C how indicated. On the other hand, the freezer is very compact and convenient.

customer_reviews.title: Excellent product for the price
customer_reviews.text: Works great freezes products quickly good value for the price

customer_reviews.text: Internal lock was just what we needed for medication storage for clients.

customer_reviews.text: we are using the freezer and it is working out great. it will be camping with us this next year.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Love it
customer_reviews.text: Very quiet fridge/freezer. I was extremely impressed that the internal temperature got down to -22 degrees celsius in the freezer mode, which is incredible. It makes almost no noise, and is stylish and lockable. Perfect for keeping my Botox cold at my medical aesthetics practice.
customer_reviews.author: Brittany M

customer_reviews.title: ... lock should be tighter but I am overall very happy with it
customer_reviews.text: The lock should be tighter but I am overall very happy with it.
customer_reviews.author: Jenyne Walker Nichols

customer_reviews.title: what a great freezer/refrigerator
customer_reviews.text: Perfect for our needs in our motorhome as an extra freezer.
customer_reviews.author: Mjr

customer_reviews.title: bigger than desired
customer_reviews.text: I was looking for a mini travel freezer and this was the closest I could find. It's the size of a mini fridge. Maybe one day a decently priced mini "travel" freezer will be invented...
customer_reviews.author: Gee

customer_reviews.title: Good as a Freezer only
customer_reviews.text: I used this fridge/freezer for breast milk storage. Works really well...no problem with it..freezes my bottle milk in quick time. Cons: Refrigerator portion is tough... i haven't figure out how to use it as a fridge yet.
customer_reviews.author: Zouapha

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for my dad's needs
customer_reviews.text: I knew this would be perfect for my dad to store his beer in and it totally has proven itself by doing so. Having a lock on it is only a plus so my younger brother can't steal his stuff again
customer_reviews.author: Jessica

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: perfect addition to our bar. Holds ice and a few bottles can stand up in front
